Flint.Flint Cultural Center:
The Flint Cultural Center (FCC) is a campus of institutes located in Flint, Michigan, United States. It is dedicated to promoting area residents with an array of cultural, scientific, and artistic experiences and promotes understanding of the diverse cultures reflected in the Greater Flint community.
The institutions located on the grounds of the FCC are the Sloan Museum, Buick Gallery & Research Center, Flint Institute of Arts, Robert T. Longway Planetarium, The Whiting, Flint Youth Theatre, and the Flint Institute of Music.
